name: Sorcery Conduit (Duel Links Skill)
text:
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
If you lose 1500 or more LP, you can activate this Skill during your next Draw Phase.
During your Draw Phase, instead of drawing a card, you can activate this Skill.
Reveal 3 Spellcaster monsters from your Deck, your opponent randomly picks 1 for you to add to your hand, and you shuffle the rest into your Deck.
If you do that, flip this card over.

(This Skill has been adapted to work in our format, and it attempts to replicate its function in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links.)
